name: Coliseum City Bride
description:
An RPG featuring an elder sister and younger brother that fight at the
coliseum to pay off a massive debt left behind by their no good father.

Her resolve may be strong but what awaits a defeated female warrior
at the coliseum is a fate worse than death... the forced marriage with
her victorious opponent is the rule of this battlefield!

Can these siblings successfully pay off their debts or will she succumb...?

[System]
An orthodox RPG. Explore dungeons, collect items, level up,
become stronger and win your way through the coliseum battles.
